    FJPJP SDN BHD Vacancies Front Desk Officer/Personal Assistant/Food/Beverage (Kitchen)

    November 14, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    FJPJP SDN BHD is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Front Desk Officer/Personal Assistant/Food/Beverage (Kitchen) position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Front Desk officer
      • Handling arrival, check in out, registration and transaction of all the hotel guests.
      • Answering the telephone and welcome guest with a warm greeting
      • Understanding guest needs and preference and provide necessary assistance to ensure their satisfaction.
      Requirements
      • Those who had experience in relevant fields are encouraged to apply..
      • Ability to communicate in English, Bahasa Malaysia , Mandrin.
      • Able to perform shift duty.
      Job Info:
      • Salary: min. RM 1 500 - RM 2 500 Per month
      • Contract Type: Full time
      • Experience Level: Any
      • Category: Tourism/Hotels
      Personal Assistant私人助理 (Full-Time & Part-Time)
      - Provide Training
      - Can work immediately
      - Must have a sense of responsibility and a positive attitude
      - General knowledge of Mandarin, Bahasa Melayu and English (write,speak,listen) Normal level just find
      - SPM Fresh graduates are also acceptable (as long willing to learn)
      - Only those with no work experience (as long willing to learn)
      - Own transportation
      - Real estate Field
      - Work place Penang
      - Processing documents, meeting arrangement records, invitation arrangements, itinerary arrangements
      - 提供职业培训
      - 可立即上班
      - 须有责任感和积极正面的态度
      - 通晓华，巫，英（写,说,听）一般即可
      - 离校生毕业者也可 (只要肯学)
      - 没工作经验者即可 (只要肯学)
      - 能自备交通
      - 工作地点Penang, KL
      -可以出坡
      - 处理文件，开会安排记录，邀约安排，行程安排
      Job Info:
      • Salary: min. RM 2 000 - RM2 500
      • Contract Type: Fulltime
      • Experience Level: Any
      Food&Beverage (Kitchen) Hiring: 
      -面包师 2-3位，最少 2年经验
      -饮料师和帮手2位，最少 2年经验
      -外场服务生 3位
      两班制 :
      -早 Morning Shif :7:30am to 3:30pm 
      -晚  Night Shif    :4:30pm to 12.00m 
      营业时间Business Hour  :
      -8am to 12pm
      Job Info:
      • Salary: min. RM 1 500 - RM2 500
      • Contract Type: Fulltime
      • Experience Level: Any
      *Please remark resume must have your photo with personal detail
      Contact person by Whatapp: Derren 011 2770 0936
                                                    Cathy 019 260 7435

    Company Overview

    We believe in a people-oriented business which must be generally experienced in our company.
    We must ensure our employees' contentment in their jobs while sustaining fairness in every aspect in our partnership.
    We believe in creating a family-like environment for our employees where every one of them is respected, well taken care of and appreciated.
    Our employees deserve to be recognized and rewarded, thus we must constantly empower them through incentives, awards and advancement.
    In order to uphold our culture, we must build up our employees with our beliefs though proper training and development.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hotel job in Bayan Lepas.
